properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Cape Charles Light to Virginia-North Carolina border out to 20 nm; Coastal waters from NC VA border to Currituck Beach Light NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Low Water Advisory issued January 11 at 2:24PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Low Water Advisory, abnormally low water levels
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt. A few gusts up to 35 kt possible. Seas
4 to 7 ft.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Cape Charles Light to Currituck
Beach Light NC out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Low Water Advisory, from midnight tonight to 7
AM EST Sunday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 PM EST
Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Below
normal water levels will result in hazardous navigating
conditions.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SUNDAY... ...LOW WATER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
